summary: A slightly sinister but charming young man falls in with a young mother and daughter and her boyfriend on a camping holiday and leads them astray.
cast: Anabelle Lachatte|Florian Panzner|Martin Kiefer|Lena Beyerling|Jadwiga Iwona Domaszewicz|Agnieszka Grochowska|Rafal Kosinski|Stasio Mazurek|Norbert Pokorski|Stefanie Banske|Magnus Czepluch|Martin Hartung|Sven Hoffmann|Jakob Hüfner|Benjamin Kettowski|Tomasz Krzemieniecki|Krzysztof Malewicz|Marcin Painta|Jenny Voelsch
title: Unterwegs
